item.description:
Dance at Whippersnappers

Saturday Jan. 7th. anytime after 7 pm. Band starts at 9:30,

Whippersnappers

rt 102 Londonderry Commans

Londonderry NH. 03053

http://www.whippersnappersnh.com

Cover charge $5. after 7ish

Dance to Moma Kicks

Host:Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

 

I am doing dinner and drinks at 7pm. Dance at 9:30pm.. So, please let me know if you are doing dinner with us. Dinner people need to get there as close to 7 as possible. Seats are almost impossible to hold.

        Join us for dinner or just for dancing at 7 pm. with no cover charge, or you can just get there anytime you can. But, the cover charge usually starts at 7. The Band doesn't start til 9:30. So, we will be having dinner or drinks at 7 and dancing to the Dj after that. They usually have a two dinners for $20. specials. It has always been a great deal.

        We have danced to this Band here many times before, and we danced all night. So come and get there early. If you can?  So Steve O. can introduce you to as many people as he can. Once the Band starts, everyone is on the dance floor. So, there is no one to introduce you too.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Dance at Whippersnapper's
